backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining data types, maps, authorization mixins, storage, and helper validation functions for orders, users, designs, and activity logs.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module passing old actor state through unchanged to the new actor structure during upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature requests, affected files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across components, hooks, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS root theme variables and base styles defining light and dark mode color tokens and applying global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point providing root div and loading the main React script.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, theme colors, start URL, and icons.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing caching strategies for assets and pages with install, fetch, and activate handlers.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, authentication checks, bootstrap loading, and role-based navigation for the app. Handles error states, blocked users, and initial admin setup flow.
frontend/src/components/admin/TotalQtyBr: Displays a dialog showing quantity totals and category-wise breakdown values. Computes and renders a grand total with styled list items.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access-denied message with an option to navigate back to the dashboard. Used when a user lacks permission for a route.
frontend/src/components/auth/BlockedUser: Displays a full-page block notice for users whose accounts are disabled. Includes logout functionality that clears identity and cached queries.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Shows a detailed error screen when profile bootstrap fails, with retry and logout options. Displays formatted backend error details if available.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button that integrates with Internet Identity. Handles authentication state, loading states, and retrying failed logins.
frontend/src/components/auth/NoProfileBl: Shows a screen for authenticated users without a profile, prompting them to share their principal ID. Includes copy-to-clipboard and refresh actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for initial admin profile setup, allowing the first user to enter their name. Submits the profile and refreshes relevant queries.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Restricts content based on effective user role, showing loading or access-denied screens as needed. Renders children only for allowed roles.
frontend/src/components/designImages/Des: Renders a table of design image mappings with design codes, names, image availability, and creation dates. Shows a placeholder when no mappings exist.
Displays a dialog that loads and shows a design image for a given code with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Provides a global React error boundary that shows a friendly error screen with details and logout/reset options.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorDeta: Shows collapsible technical error details with a copy‑to‑clipboard button.
frontend/src/components/errors/InlineErr: Renders an inline error alert with optional retry and expandable technical details.
frontend/src/components/exports/ExportAc: Offers export options for orders, including CSV and per‑karigar PDF/JPEG exports with filtering.
frontend/src/components/exports/KarigarD: Provides export controls for a specific karigar, supporting daily or total PDF/JPEG downloads.
frontend/src/components/exports/KarigarE: UI panel for filtering orders by date or design and exporting them as PDF or JPEG.
frontend/src/components/karigar/AddKarig: Dialog for adding a new karigar with validation to prevent duplicate names and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/karigar/KarigarO: Dialog component showing detailed karigar order info with fields, status, date, and an image viewer trigger.
frontend/src/components/karigar/TotalKar: Searchable dialog listing all karigars with loading, error, and empty states.
Main app shell providing role‑based navigation, responsive mobile menu, and header UI components.
frontend/src/components/masterDesigns/Ma: Form dialog to create or edit master designs, validate karigar names, and handle confirmation when assignments change.
Dialog for importing master design files, parsing them, previewing results, and saving updates with summary feedback.
Table displaying master designs with edit and activate/deactivate actions and status indicators.
frontend/src/components/orders/Ingestion: Displays a scrollable preview table of ingested orders, highlighting unmapped design codes and PDF‑derived karigar assignments.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersDat: Shows a destructive alert warning when invalid orders are detected in cache and provides a button to clear cached data.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersFil: Provides interactive filters for karigar, status, dates, CO/RB flags, and optional order number search, updating parent state on change.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersTab: Renders a selectable orders table with status, quantities, actions, and validation, supporting RB edit actions and conditional row highlighting.
frontend/src/components/orders/PartialFu: Dialog allowing users to enter supplied quantities for multiple RB orders with validation before confirming.
frontend/src/components/orders/RbSupplie: Dialog for editing an RB order’s total supplied quantity with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/status/BackendSt: Shows backend reachability with online/offline/checking states and optional canister ID display with copy and refresh controls.
frontend/src/components/status/Connectiv: Displays online/offline browser connectivity and offline sync queue status with manual sync option.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReachabilit: Periodically checks backend health, classifies errors, and reports online/offline status and canister metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyToClipboard.ts: Provides clipboard copy functionality with temporary success/error status labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user's profile with error classification, retry rules, and actor state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useEffectiveAppRole.t: Computes a user's effective app role by combining profile data with backend admin checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrdersCache.ts: Hydrates orders from IndexedDB, merges with backend data, sanitizes cache, and manages loading/error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating orders, master designs, and related data via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Creates a safe backend actor with timeout, authentication handling, and optional admin initialization.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme variables, dark mode styles, and responsive admin tab styling.
frontend/src/lib/exports/karigarOrdersDo: Generates an iOS‑compatible printable PDF for karigar orders with formatted summaries and tables.
frontend/src/lib/exports/ordersExport.ts: Filters and exports orders to CSV based on type such as all, karigar, customer orders, or daily.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/applyMasterDesi: Applies master design mappings to orders, producing mapped, unmapped, and preview results.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/normalizeDesign: Normalizes design codes by trimming and collapsing whitespace for consistent matching.
frontend/src/lib/orders/chunkOrders.ts: Splits an order list into fixed‑size batches, validating batch size.
frontend/src/lib/orders/deriveMetrics.ts: Computes aggregate order metrics, including totals and per‑karigar statistics.
frontend/src/lib/orders/formatKarigarNam: Formats karigar names, returning 'Unassigned' for empty or whitespace inputs.
frontend/src/lib/orders/formatOptionalNu: Formats optional numeric fields with fixed decimals, returning empty strings when absent.
frontend/src/lib/orders/generateKarigarP: Builds a deterministic PO code from a karigar name using a three‑letter prefix and numeric suffix.
frontend/src/lib/orders/getOrderTimestam: Returns an order timestamp preferring uploadDate over createdAt and converts nanoseconds to a Date.
Checks if an order type string identifies a customer order by checking for 'co'.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersDesign: Sanitizes and sorts orders by normalized designCode then orderNo.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersKariga: Sanitizes and sorts orders by karigar name, then design code, then orderNo.
frontend/src/lib/orders/validatePersiste: Provides a type guard for validating PersistentOrder fields and filters invalid orders.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/extractIm: Extracts embedded images from an XLSX file using JSZip and maps them to rows.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseDesi: Parses a workbook for design-image mappings, validating columns and attaching embedded images to rows.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseMast: Parses master design entries from an Excel sheet using flexible header matching.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseOrde: Parses orders from an Excel workbook with flexible column matching, validation, and warning handling.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/readWorkb: Loads SheetJS if needed and reads an Excel file into a validated workbook object.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/masterDesignPar: Chooses PDF or Excel parsing for master designs and delegates to the appropriate parser.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/orderParser.ts: Routes uploaded files to PDF or Excel parsers, handling errors and returning parsed orders with warnings.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/extractText: Loads PDF.js dynamically and extracts structured text lines from each page for downstream parsing.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseMaster: Parses master design mappings from flattened PDF text by locating a header row and extracting design entries.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseOrders: Parses orders from PDF text using table-row or section-header formats, producing PersistentOrder objects.
Parses a single PDF table-row into an order when tokens match expected formats and validations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context providers.
frontend/src/offline/db.ts: Implements IndexedDB storage for orders, master designs, and queued ingestion batches including CRUD helpers.
frontend/src/offline/sync.ts: React hook that processes queued offline ingestions, uploads them, and updates sync state and caches.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders the main admin dashboard with tabs, filters, order tables, cache handling, bulk updates, dialogs, and metrics for managing all orders.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DesignImagesPag: Handles uploading, parsing, previewing, and saving design image mappings from Excel files.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MasterDesignsPa: Displays and manages master design mappings with search, add, edit, import, and karigar-related dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementP: Provides user creation, approval management, and block/unblock actions with a table of user profiles.
frontend/src/pages/karigar/KarigarDashbo: Shows a karigar's active orders with filters, metrics, cache handling, and tools to request approval or mark orders delivered.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen with branding, background, and a login button.
frontend/src/pages/setup/BootstrapAdminP: Initializes the first admin by submitting a bootstrap token and refreshing authentication state.
frontend/src/pages/staff/IngestOrdersPag: Provides a UI for uploading, parsing, mapping, previewing, and batch‑uploading order files with progress and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/staff/StaffDashboardP: Renders staff dashboards with tabs, filtering, metrics, order tables, activity logs, and dialogs for editing and image viewing.
frontend/src/pages/staff/UnmappedDesignC: Displays unmapped design codes with search, grouping, and a dialog to add new master design mappings.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker, listens for updates, logs status, and triggers periodic update checks.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapErrorClassif: Classifies bootstrap errors into stopped‑canister or network issues and extracts safe diagnostic info.
frontend/src/utils/errorPresentation.ts: Generates user‑friendly error messages using bootstrap classification and fallback heuristics.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), and persist, retrieve, or clear them via sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout, rejecting if it doesn’t resolve within the specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for responsive themed UI.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, existing issues, and requested fixes for karigar validation, admin tab responsiveness, and design‑image retrieval.
